questions.question: A number is divisible by 2 if it ends in...

choices.answer: An even number
An odd number

questions.question: A number is divisible by 3 if..

choices.answer: The sum of its digits is divisible by 3
The sum of its digits is an odd number
The last two digits are divisible by 3
The last digit is 0

questions.question: A number is divisible by 4 if...

choices.answer: The number formed by the last 2 digits is divisible by 4
It passes the divisibility test for 2
It's last digit is even
The sum of its digits is divisible by 4

questions.question: A number is divisible by 5 if...

choices.answer: Its last digit is a 5 or a 0
The sum of its digits is divisible by 5
Its last digit is even
It passes the divisibility test for 2 and 3

questions.question: If a number passes the divisibility tests for 2 and 3 it..

choices.answer: Is also divisible by 6
Is also divisible by 5
Is only divisible by 2 and 3
Is divisible by 9 as well

questions.question: There is no divisibility test for..
A number if divisible by 8 if...

choices.answer: The number formed by the last 3 digits is divisible by 8
It passes the divisibility tests for 2 and 4.
The sum of its digits is divisible by 8
The number formed by the last 2 digits is divisible by 8.

questions.question: A number is divisible by 9 if..

choices.answer: The sum of its digits is divisible by 9
The number formed by the last three digits is divisible by 9
It passes the divisibility test for 3 and 6
It ends in a 3

questions.question: A number is divisible by 10 if...

choices.answer: The last digit is 0
The last digit is even
The sum of its digits is divisible by 10
The sum of its last 3 digits is divisible by 10
Undefined
Itself
Undefined
Itself
